## End-to-End Safety Oversight Workflow

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A[Event Occurs] --> B[Investigator Assessment]
  B --> C[AE/SAE Documentation]
  C --> D[Sponsor Safety Review]
  D --> E[Follow-Up Information]
  E --> F[CRA Verification]
  F --> G[TMF / Site Binder Filing]
```

## CRA Safety Workflow (Visit-Level)

- [ ] Review AE/SAE listings
- [ ] Cross-check against source documentation
- [ ] Identify missing or late reports
- [ ] Request follow-up documentation
- [ ] Document actions in visit report
